title: Avocado and White Bean Salsa
directions: Rinse and drain enough beans to measure 1/2 cup and reserve remainder for another use. Halve, pit, and peel avocado. Finely chop avocado, tomato, and onion and fold together with beans, lime juice, oil, and salt to taste.
ingredients: a 16-ounce can small white beans such as navy
